Name: Cherry Blossom #2
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain into. Top with soda and prosecco.
Review: Refreshing citrusy cherry fortified with cognac.
History: Created in 2015 by Noel Hunwick at Inamo, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Cherry Blossom #2 contains 128 calories
